altername_name: Dome no Yabou 2 - The Race of Champions
name: Doumu no Yabou 2: The Race of Champions
overview: Doyume no Yabou 2 The Race of Champions is the sequel to a 1996 F1 strategy game, in this game the player can also build his own formula 1 car choosing the different parts of the car and then chosing the driver that will test the car. After that he can see the test and races using different camera angles. The game features an updated graphic engine and the same features, stats and different options that the first game got.
